Title: UNEDITABLE_SCHEMAS and UNEDITABLE_TABLE_DESCRIPTION_MATCH_RULES not respected by frontend service backend
Description: Any install that has `UNEDITABLE_SCHEMAS` and/or `UNEDITABLE_TABLE_DESCRIPTION_MATCH_RULES` set in the front-end, is being impacted. The value of these properties is ignored if set, allowing any user to modify table and column descriptions, even though the properties imply they shouldn't be.
NotImpacted: All versions before 2.3.0, all versions after 2.3.0 before 3.0.0, all versions after 3.0.0
